1. John Wick (2014) - Directed by Christopher Nolan and starring Keanu Reeves as an expert assassin who is forced out of retirement when his former employer is murdered.
John Wick is a fast-paced action movie that features high-stakes shootouts between martial artists. The movie has received widespread critical acclaim for its compelling storyline, excellent acting performances, and breathtaking visual effects.
2. Mission Impossible: Fallout (2018) - Directed by Christopher Nolan and starring Tom Cruise as a highly skilled MI agent who is tasked with preventing a catastrophic nuclear war that could end civilization as we know it.
Mission Impossible: Fallout is an action-packed spy movie that features high-stakes shootouts between MI agents, intense battle scenes between MI agents and enemy forces, and breathtaking visual effects that bring the world of espionage to life in stunning detail.
I hope these recommendations are helpful!
